segments.text: are you ready to go the concert ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes . Should we go there by bus so we aren't late ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: actually , why don't we go there by bike ? We could get stuck in traffic if we travel by bus in such hour .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's true . Cycling is good for our environment , too . Let me just get my helmet then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: not really , but I liked the design , so I got it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: maybe you should think about getting a round helmet ; they're better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , my father gave it to me for my birthday . Do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's the newest 10 speed cycling mountain bike . These are really expensive !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: nothing but the best from my dad . I like everything about it except for the brakes . They are a bit sticky .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can fix those for you . Is there anything else wrong with it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , my saddle is too low for me . Do you know how to change the height ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's easy . It's important to have the saddle high enough so that your legs can extend fully when you are on your bicycle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: is that why my knees have felt sore after every time I've ridden my bike ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's possible . Give me a minute and I can fix these for you and then we can go .
segments.speaker: S1
